title.en: An Aspiration Prayer for the Flourishing of the Jonang Teachings

text.en: Having perfectly meditated upon generating the enlightened mind for incalculable eons,
text.en-trans: drang yé kalpar tukkyé lek gompé

text.en: The incomparable sovereign of the Śākyas wisely brought down the rain
text.en-trans: tayé drowé rekong damchö char

text.en: Of sublime teachings in order to fulfill the wishes of illimitable beings.
text.en-trans: beb khé nyammé shakyé wangpo yi

text.en: To you who protects beings through glorious virtue, I pay homage!
text.en-trans: dro di gelek pal gyi kyang du sol

text.en: The intended meaning of the three successive Wheels of Dharma
text.en-trans: rim sum chö kyi khorlö gongpé dön

text.en: Was explicated from multiple realizations derived from study and practice.
text.en-trans: khé dang drub nyé dumé tralwa lé

text.en: This is what distinguishes the one from the many gates of the Buddha's Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö kyi go mang rab yé yagyal chik

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Amidst the vast lotus grove of the victor's teachings in the Land of Snow,
text.en-trans: gangjong gyalten pemé tsal yangpor

text.en: Hundreds of petals of Buddhist exposition and meditation systems bloomed.
text.en-trans: shedrub chö tsul dabgya drolwé trö

text.en: Among them, the dynamic intent of the final Wheel of Dharma was revealed.
text.en-trans: khorlo tamé gongpa tsal tönpé

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: You uphold and transmit an unparalleled oral transmission,
text.en-trans: dogyü zhen dang shé sol midrawé

text.en: A commentarial tradition distinct from other sūtras and tantras
text.en-trans: shingté sol chen dü kyi khorlö gyü

text.en: On the great chariot tradition of the Kālacakra Tantra.
text.en-trans: mi nyam dzin ching pelwé kabab pa

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: From Yumo Mikyö Dorje, through Dolpopa,
text.en-trans: yumo mi kyö dorjé né zung té

text.en: Kunga Drolchok, the protector Jetsun Tāranātha,
text.en-trans: dol buwa dang kün ga drolwé chok

text.en: And successive masters, your lineage has gracefully disseminated.
text.en-trans: jetsün drol gön sok kyi lek pelwé

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The timelessly ultimate residing, stable, enduring
text.en-trans: nyingpö do dang ludrub zhung gi dön

text.en: Enlightened essence is the indivisible ground and fruition.
text.en-trans: zhi dré yermé takten deshek nying

text.en: This is the way elucidated in the Essence Sūtras and the meaning beheld by Nāgārjuna.
text.en-trans: yené zhukpé döndam drelwé tsul

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Your Middle Way zhentong view of the sūtras
text.en-trans: do yi tawa zhen tong uma dang

text.en: And your practice of the Six Yogas which unfolds the meaning of the tantras
text.en-trans: gyü dön naljor druk gi nyamlen gyi

text.en: Are great traditions of explanation that activate the actual dimension of reality.
text.en-trans: chöku ngön du dzepé zhé sol ché

text.en: May the teachings of the Jonang flourish!
text.en-trans: jonangpa yi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the great blessings of the sources of refuge, the victor and the victor's children,
text.en-trans: kyabné gyal dang gyalsé jin chen dang

text.en: Through the power of the unalterable ultimate nature of reality,
text.en-trans: chönyi döndam gyurwa mepé tob

text.en: Through the force of divine virtue, and through our devotion,
text.en-trans: karchok lha dang dakchak mögü tü

text.en: May this aspiration prayer be fulfilled accordingly!
text.en-trans: mönlam di tab jizhin drubpar shok
